Detailed Description

Helper class that stores and invokes the map changed callbacks.

Java and Python Wrappers: Not available in Java or Python wrapper libraries.

Member Function Documentation

void ArMapChangedHelper::addPreMapChangedCB ( ArFunctor *  functor,
ArListPos::Pos  position = ArListPos::LAST 
) [virtual]

Adds a callback called before the map changed callbacks are called.

Note that these callbacks are simply invoked before the "normal" map changed callbacks. They are not
